name: The Rebirth Of Darkness 3
description:
Story:

You are a space guard hired by Dark corporation, you must spend a week on Mars watching over and taking care of the Martian establishment.

How to play:

You will have to survive, analyze your computer in case the animatronics have given you a virus, then repair it if that is the case, and close doors.
You can also hide in case they enter your office.

System requirements:

GPU: NVIDIA GeForce 1030 GT or superior

CPU: Intel Core i5 3470 or superior

RAM: 1 GB or higher

OS: Windows 7/8/10 (x64)

API: Direct3D11 or higher
